FEATURES :
Immerse yourself in an endless stream of racing events in the incredible world Trials Fusion. Show all that capable , overcoming obstacles and soaring skyward on trampolines in an attempt to break the record of the best racers in the world. No matter whether you pass the track alone, are competing with friends or participate in global competition - in the world around you there is always a sense of competition . In this race to the official routes - this is only the beginning. Those who intend to conquer more and more insane tracks, waiting for the rich world of custom tracks created by the most creative and skillful writers. Long-term support of the game and the regular addition of her new features and content will further expand the universe Trials and tirelessly to please the players new unusual tests.
